text:
ace. 
/circle6 Feel gently around the baby’s neck for the presence of the umbilical cord, check: 
/lozenge6 If the cord is present and is loose around the neck, deliver the baby through the 
loop of the cord, or slip the cord over the baby’s head.
/lozenge6 If the cord is tight around the neck, place two clamps on the cord and cut between 
the clamps, and then unwind it from around the neck.
Delivery of the shoulders and the rest of the baby
/circle6 Wait for spontaneous rotation and delivery of
